original: If I knew the truth, I would tell you.
translated: Si je savais la vérité, je te la dirais.

original: The stars are shining in the sky.
translated: Les étoiles brillent dans le ciel.

original: On Saturday evenings everybody in the family had a bath one after another in an old tin bath in front of the fire.
translated: Les samedis soir, chaque membre de la famille prenait un bain, l'un après l'autre, dans une vieille baignoire en étain en face du feu.

original: Apples are cheap today.
translated: Les pommes sont bon marché aujourd'hui.

original: He goes there three times a week.
translated: Il y va trois fois par semaine.

original: We're giving this away for free.
translated: Nous offrons cela gratuitement.

original: My mother called me.
translated: Ma mère m'a appelé.

original: He took the proper steps to meet the situation.
translated: Il a pris les mesures adéquates pour faire face à la situation.

original: That's my problem, not yours.
translated: C'est mon problème, pas le tien.

original: He went on singing.
translated: Il a continué de chanter.

original: Tom has got a large family.
translated: Tom a une grande famille.

original: Make a decision and make it with the confidence that you are right.
translated: Prenez une décision et prenez-la avec la certitude que vous avez raison.

original: When the water was brought to a boil, she added the ingredients.
translated: Quand l'eau entra en ébullition elle ajouta les ingrédients.

original: I don't mind if I get wet.
translated: Je m'en moque si je suis mouillé.

original: That's a big deal.
translated: C'est une grosse affaire.

original: I'm looking for a job.
translated: Je cherche du travail.

original: She competed in the Paralympic Games.
translated: Elle a concouru aux Jeux Paralympiques.

original: My driver's license will expire next week.
translated: Mon permis de conduire expire la semaine prochaine.

original: I don't care about politics.
translated: Je n'ai rien à faire de la politique.

original: Tom isn't as rich as Mary.
translated: Tom n'est pas aussi riche que Marie.

original: I still have some work to do.
translated: J'ai encore du travail à faire.

original: You've got some nerve.
translated: Tu as du culot.

original: She has blue eyes.
translated: Elle a les yeux bleus.

original: It's thirty kilometers away.
translated: C'est à trente kilomètres.

original: Tell me where she lives.
translated: Dis-moi où elle vit !

original: You said it yourself.
translated: Tu l'as dit toi-même.

original: I surprised myself.
translated: Je me suis surprise.

original: Contact him.
translated: Contacte-le.

original: I thought you were supposed to be at school now.
translated: Je pensais que tu étais censée être à l'école maintenant.

original: I just didn't want you to think I was stingy.
translated: Je n'ai simplement pas voulu que vous pensiez que j'étais radin.

original: It was a warm summer night.
translated: C'était une chaude soirée d'été.

original: I'd like you to translate this document into French.
translated: J'aimerais que tu traduises ce document en français.

original: The level of unbridled misogyny at the barbershop made me feel as if I had stepped back in time.
translated: Le niveau de misogynie débridée chez le barbier m'a fait me sentir comme si j'avais remonté le temps.

original: He is still angry with you for your conduct.
translated: Il est encore en colère contre vous à cause de votre conduite.

original: Wait a bit longer.
translated: Attends encore un peu !

original: Mary is a girlie girl.
translated: Marie est une fille jusqu'au bout des ongles.

original: You will never be too old to learn.
translated: Personne n'est trop vieux pour apprendre.

original: Which movie did you watch yesterday?
translated: Tu as regardé quel film hier ?

original: Tom arrested the criminals.
translated: Tom arrêtait les criminels.

original: She pushed me gently.
translated: Elle m'a gentiment poussée.

original: You're cute.
translated: Vous êtes mignonne.

original: The capital of the state is right on the equator.
translated: La capitale de l'état est situé juste sur l'équateur.

original: If it's that hot, how about you take off all your clothes?
translated: S'il fait si chaud que ça, pourquoi n'ôtez-vous pas tous vos vêtements ?

original: Tom said to ask you.
translated: Tom a dit de te demander.

original: They dealt with the prisoners kindly.
translated: Ils s'occupaient gentiment des prisonniers.

original: I'd rather take a taxi than walk.
translated: Je préférerais prendre un taxi plutôt que de marcher.
